alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Oklahoma and southeastern Canadian Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oklahoma City to 3 miles northeast of Union City. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Del City, El Reno, Yukon, Bethany, Mustang, Warr Acres, The Village, Nichols Hills, Woodlawn Park, Smith Village, Richland, The Capitol, Wiley Post Airport and The Fairgrounds. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 124 and 129. Interstate 40 between mile markers 125 and 154. Interstate 44 between mile markers 116 and 128. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
